org.springframework.ws.transport.http

Class HttpComponentsConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.ws.transport.AbstractWebServiceConnection
      • org.springframework.ws.transport.AbstractSenderConnection
        • org.springframework.ws.transport.http.AbstractHttpSenderConnection
          • org.springframework.ws.transport.http.HttpComponentsConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, FaultAwareWebServiceConnection, HeadersAwareSenderWebServiceConnection, WebServiceConnection

    public class HttpComponentsConnection
extends AbstractHttpSenderConnection
    Implementation of WebServiceConnection that is based on Apache HttpClient. Exposes a HttpPost and HttpResponse.
    Since:
    2.1.0
    Author:
    Alan Stewart, Barry Pitman, Arjen Poutsma, Greg Turnquist
